short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension fills in your information automatically. No more copying and pasting - let License Buddy take care of it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
License Buddy Pro: Your Ultimate License Key Management Solution

License Buddy Pro is an essential Chrome extension for developers, designers, and anyone who frequently uses licensed software, plugins, or themes. Streamline your workflow with our advanced license key management and auto-fill capabilities.

Key Features:
✔️ One-click auto-fill for single and multiple license keys
✔️ Intelligent license detection and matching based on URL
✔️ Favorite frequently used licenses for quick access
✔️ Bulk import/export of licenses (CSV and JSON support)
✔️ Google Sheets integration for collaborative license management
✔️ Aim Mode for precise license key insertion
✔️ Auto-submit option for seamless form completion
✔️ Advanced Selector Helper for custom field targeting
✔️ Resizable extension popup for improved usability
✔️ Instant-Fill on load with Alt+L keyboard shortcut
✔️ Secure local storage with encryption for your license data

New and Enhanced Features:

🆕 Sheet History: Quickly access and switch between recently used Google Sheets
🆕 Multi-Account Support: Manage separate sheet histories for different Google accounts
🆕 Enhanced Multi-Key Selection: Use Left Shift+Click to select a range of keys for bulk operations
🆕 Context Menu for Key List: Quick access to common actions for each license key
🆕 Persistent Theme Switch: Toggle between light and dark modes at any time
🆕 Improved Search and Filtering: Real-time filtering with a clear button for better user experience
🔄 Enhanced Google Sheets Integration: Improved sheet management and information display
🔄 Optimized Data Handling: Better import/export processes and migration between data structures
🔄 Improved User Interface: Dark mode support and more intuitive design

Getting Started:

Install License Buddy Pro, then add your license keys manually or import them from CSV/JSON files. Click the extension icon or use Alt+L to auto-fill license fields on any website. Our smart detection ensures the right key is used every time.

For power users, take advantage of our enhanced Google Sheets integration to manage licenses across your team or multiple devices. Enjoy improved sheet management, multi-account support, and easy access to your sheet history.

CSV Template: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19K_9UGzNwmXw7fY0jjTvgXO9h2cKuL_pDRc41_oTDco/edit?usp=sharing

Upgrade to License Buddy Pro today and experience the most efficient and feature-rich way to manage and apply your software licenses!
